pr_title: test: add test that external urls are not touched

timeline.message:
test: add test that external urls are not touched

Added test that we don't touch external
urls (relative or abosolute).
Moved flow to be under path so we can have
jetty serve "external" resources.

Fixes #9430

timeline.bodyText:
+1
Just one question: Would it be good to add a test for an external absolute URI (https..) as well? Or should flow not depend on external sources in the tests? (understandable)
timeline.author: knoobie

replies.bodyText: I did think about it, but decided not to add external dependency that is dependent on another server somewhere.
replies.author: caalador
